name: Veritas - Torch San Andres Maduro - Gran Toro
additionalNotes: The Veritas Torch San Andres Toro is a medium bodied cigar that features a dark, delicious Mexican San Andres maduro wrapper draped over a binder and filler composed of fine Nicaraguan leaves. This smooth flavorful cigar has an underlying creaminess that is accented with notes of chocolate, earth, and nuts. The Veritas Torch San Andres is handmade in Nicaragua.
